

------------with site's term name/days
select a.TERM_ID,VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE As Type,ORG_ID,b.HOLD_UNMATCHED_INVOICES_FLAG , 
c.SEGMENT1 As Vender_Num,convert(c.VENDOR_NAME,'ZHS16GBK') as Name  ,b.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,b.ADDRESS_LINE1,b.VAT_CODE
,a.DUE_DAYS as Pay_Terms_Day,g.NAME Term,d.SEGMENT3 as Pay_Acc,e.SEGMENT3 as PREPAY_ACC,b.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE as Pay_Grp
,b.CREATION_DATE,b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,f.USER_NAME as Create_by,b.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE Currency,trunc(b.INACTIVE_DATE) Site_Inactive_Date,
b.MATCH_OPTION Site_Match_Option,b.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE Site_Inc_Curr,b.PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE Site_Pay_Curr,
c.MATCH_OPTION	Supplier_Match_Option,c.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE	Supplier_Inv_Curr,
c.PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE	Supplier_Pay_Curr,b.ORG_ID
from apps.AP_TERMS_LINES a,apps.PO_VENDOR_SITES_ALL b,apps.PO_VENDORS c,apps.GL_CODE_combinations d
,apps.GL_CODE_combinations e,apps.FND_USER f,apps.AP_TERMS_TL g
where a.TERM_ID=b.TERMS_ID and g.TERM_ID=b.TERMS_ID
and b.ACCTS_PAY_CODE_COMBINATION_ID=d.CODE_COMBINATION_ID
and b.PREPAY_CODE_COMBINATION_ID=e.CODE_COMBINATION_ID
and b.VENDOR_ID=c.VENDOR_ID
and b.CREATED_BY =f.USER_ID
and g.LANGUAGE='US'
--and c.SEGMENT1='99'
and ORG_ID>=127
--and g.NAME<>'60 DAYS NET'
--and VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE<>'EMPLOYEE'
--and ((b.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE <>'EM' and (b.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE <>'RH')) or (b.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE  is null))
order by b.VENDOR_ID,b.VENDOR_SITE_CODE


-----------Vendor bank
select VENDOR_NAME,VENDOR_NUMBER,VENDOR_SITE_CODE,VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE,
ACCOUNT_TYPE,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME,BANK_ACCOUNT_NUM,BANK_BRANCH_NAME,BANK_NAME,
BANK_NUMBER,CREATION_DATE,END_DATE,ACCT_INACTIVE_DATE
from apps.AP_BANK_ACCOUNT_USES_V  


-----------Employee type Vendor link with employee
select a.VENDOR_NAME, a.SEGMENT1 Vendor_Number,b.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,b.FULL_NAME,
a.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE Supplier_Type, 
c.Description Create_By,c.Description LAST_UPDATED_BY,
a.CREATION_DATE,a.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,a.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE Pay_group,a.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE Curr,a.END_DATE_ACTIVE
from apps.PO_VENDORS a ,apps.PER_PEOPLE_V7 b,apps.FND_USER c,apps.FND_USER d
where a.EMPLOYEE_ID=b.PERSON_ID(+)
and a.CREATED_BY=c.user_id
and a.LAST_UPDATED_BY=d.user_id
and a.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE ='EMPLOYEE'
--and a.EMPLOYEE_ID is null
--and a.VENDOR_NAME<>b.FULL_NAME
